description: uniqe code for sampled species, see DTM-species.csv for details
uniqe code for each replicate of each species, a combination of spcode and number of replicate
where sample is collected, either in open area (sun) or under canopy(shade)
initial mass of sample, which include mass of sample ziplock and sample
mass of oven-dried sample, which include mass of bag and sample

variable: note: this is field fuel moisture content, and the calculation should be [(initial-ziplock)-(dry.total-bag)]/(dry.total-bag)*100%
